src:
Rehabilitasi Pasti Diterima, Yuni Balon Bupati Tunggal PDI-P Sragen
02 Nov 2019, 09:38 by Mulato Isha'an


Rehabilitasi Pasti Diterima, Yuni Balon Bupati Tunggal PDI-P Sragen

KBRN,Sragen: Niatan dr.Kusdinar Untung Yuni Sukowati maju pada pemilihan kepala daerah (pilkada) 2020 melalui Partai Demokrasi Indonesia Perjuangan (PDI-P) berjalan mulus. Karena rehabilitasi untuk kembali menjadi kader partai hampir pasti diterima. Sekretaris Dewan Pimpinan Cabang (DPC) PDI-P Sragen Suparno mengatakan, proses rehabilitasi hampir pasti diterima. Menurutnya Dewan Pimpinan Pusat (DPP) PDI-P tidak akan memberikan keputusan rehabilitasi. Melainkan menyerahkan keputusan tersebut kepada DPC, yang lebih paham dengan rekam jejaknya. "Rehabilitasi diserahkan kepada masing-masing daerah. Ada suratnya, surat udah kemarin itu berlaku nasional. Karena DPP tidak akan memberikan sebuah keputusan, intinya diserahkan kepada DPC," ungkap Suparno kepada wartawan Sabtu (2/11/2019).Untuk diketahui Bupati yang akrab disapa Mbak Yuni maju pilkada 2015 melalui partai Gerindra, karena tidak mendapat rekomendasi dari PDI-P. Saat Pilpres April 2019 lalu, Yuni berseberangan dengan instruksi Partai Gerindra. Sehingga dia mundur dari Dewan Pembina DPC Gerindra Sragen.Yuni kemudian mengajukan rehabilitasi kembali menjadi kader PDI-P, saat Konggres di Bali beberapa saat lalu. DPP menyerahkan keputusan rehabilitasi kepada DPC. Sementara ini Ketua DPC PDI-P Sragen dijabat adik kandung Yuni, yakni Untung Wibowo Sukowati. Namun demikian Suparno mengungkapkan, tidak serta merta DPC langsung meloloskan permintaan rehabilitasi menjadi kader Banteng Moncong Putih.  Karena harus melihat sejumlah aspek, di antaranya, elektabilitas, komitmen termasuk rekam jejak selama menjadi kader partai."Tapi dilihat dari sektor elektabilitas, komitmen, dan rekam jejak. Karena daerah lebih mengerti rekam jejak secara detail," jelas Suparno.Dengan kondisi demikian DPC PDI-P Sragen telah menyerahkan nama Kusdinar Untung Yuni Sukowati sebagai bakal calon bupati tunggal. Sementara lima nama telah diusulkan untuk menjadi wakil Yuni di Pilkada 2020 mendatang. "Ada satu balon bupati dan lima wakil. Sudah kita laporkan secara administrasi ke DPP. Yang daftar (melalui PDI-P) kita paparkan," ujarnya.Suparno mengaku, pihaknya sudah memaparkan nama-nama yang diusung maju pilkada termasuk rekam jejak dan komitmennya. Sementara semua keputusan rekomendasi cabub-cawabup menjadi kewenangan DPP PDI-P."Tapi tidak tahu nanti nama wakil yang dipilih. Banyak pertimbangan selain elektabilitas siapa yang bakal menang nantinya," pungkas politikus yang kini menjabat Ketua DPRD Sragen 2019-2024 itu.
text:
Rehabilitation Is Certainly Accepted, Yuni Ballon Single Regent PDI-P Sragen
02 Nov 2019, 09:38 by Mulato Isha'an


Rehabilitation Is Certainly Accepted, Yuni Ballon Single Regent PDI-P Sragen

KBRN, Sragen: The intention of Dr. Kusdinar Untung Yuni Sukowati to advance in the 2020 regional head election through the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle (PDI-P) went smoothly. Because rehabilitation to return to party cadre is almost certain to be accepted. Secretary of the PDI-P Branch Management Board (DPC) Sragen Suparno said the rehabilitation process was almost certain to be accepted. According to him the Central Leadership Council (DPP) PDI-P will not provide rehabilitation decisions. Rather submit the decision to the DPC, who is more familiar with its track record. "Rehabilitation is handed over to each region. There is a letter, the letter was valid yesterday nationally. Because the DPP will not give a decision, the point is submitted to the DPC," Suparno said to reporters on Saturday (11/02/2019). familiarly called Mbak Yuni, advancing the 2015 elections through the Gerindra party, because they did not get a recommendation from the PDI-P. During the April 2019 Presidential Election, Yuni was at odds with the Gerindra Party's instructions. So he resigned from the Board of Trustees of DPC Gerindra Sragen. Yuni then proposed rehabilitation again to become a PDI-P cadre, during the Congress in Bali some time ago. DPP submits rehabilitation decisions to DPC. Meanwhile, the Chairperson of Sragen PDI-P DPC is Yuni's younger brother, Untung Wibowo Sukowati. However, Suparno revealed, DPC did not immediately pass the rehabilitation request to become a White Bull Spout cadre. Because they have to look at a number of aspects, including electability, commitment including track record while being a party cadre. "But seen from the electability, commitment and track record sector. Because the regions understand better the track record in detail," Suparno. explained. PDI-P Sragen has submitted the name of Kusdinar Untung Yuni Sukowati as a single candidate for regent. While five names have been proposed to become Yuni's representatives in the upcoming 2020 elections. "There is a balloon of the regent and five deputies. We have reported it administratively to the DPP. The list (through the PDI-P) we explained," he said. Suparno admitted that his party had presented the names carried forward by the elections including its track record and commitment. While all decisions of the cabub-cawabup recommendation are under the authority of the PDI-P DPP. "But I don't know the name of the elected representative later. There are many considerations other than electability who will win later," concluded the politician who now serves as Chairman of the DPRD Sragen 2019-2024.
